predicate.note: Frames file for 'adore' based on sentences in EBC. Verbnet entry 31.2, other members include admire, cherish, distrust, envy, favor, grudge, loathe, love, pity, relish, savor, tolerate, value, and worship.

example.name: both args
example.text: We both adore her very well and admire her immensely.
